Address: 14 NORTH MAIN STREET P. O. BOX 64197, SOUDERTON, Pennsylvania, 18964, United States of America
CompanyDescription: The Corporation is a Pennsylvania corporation, organized in 1973 and registered as a bank holding company pursuant to the Bank Holding Company Act of 1956. The Corporation owns all of the capital stock of Univest Bank and Trust Co. (the Bank). The consolidated financial statements include the accounts of the Corporation and its wholly owned subsidiary, the Bank. The Corporation's and the Bank's legal headquarters are located at 14 North Main Street, Souderton, PA 18964. At December 31, 2019, the Corporation had total assets of $5.4 billion, net loans and leases of $4.4 billion, total deposits of $4.4 billion and total shareholders' equity of $675.1 million. The Bank is a Pennsylvania state-chartered bank and trust company. As a state-chartered member bank of the Federal Reserve System, the Bank is regulated primarily by the Pennsylvania Department of Banking and Securities and the Federal Reserve Bank of Philadelphia.  ...
